channel.title: BBC Nitro programmes feed - films
channel.description: Unofficial BBC iPlayer feeds via the Nitro API

item.title: Invaders from Mars - 25/04/1999
item.description: Sci-fi classic. A young boy's excitement at seeing a spaceship land outside his house quickly turns to fear when everyone who visits the site returns in a zombie-like state, apparently under the control of the alien life forms within the vessel.
